DOC.brief_title: Phase II Pilot Study Granulocyte Colony-Stimulating Factor Inherited Bone Marrow Failure Syndromes
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients receive granulocyte colony-stimulating factor ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously every day 8 week ; nonresponders receive increase dose additional 8 week . Patients respond week 8 16 taper low maintenance dose G-CSF administer every day week 40 . The dose adjust maintain absolute neutrophil count 1500 . Patients remove study failure achieve complete response week 16 , unacceptable nonhematologic toxicity , identification clonal karyotype marrow , onset leukemia .
